message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product offers. Let's make this deal happen!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. Can you meet me at $920,000?
Bob, I'm happy to keep negotiating, but I can't go any lower than $940,000. This product is worth a lot more, but I'm trying to be fair to you. Let me know if you're ready to make a deal.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. Can you meet me at $915,000?

Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're not going to reach an agreement. I'm happy to keep trying, but I'm not going to go any lower than $930,000. This is a final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to move on to other potential buyers.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $900,000 and $930,000. Can you meet me at $915,000?
